paper_abstract: In this paper, by using a comparison theorem and some analysis techniques, we obtain the sufficient conditions of the predator-extinction positive periodic solution and the permanence of a delayed predator-prey system with impulsive diffusion. Finally, a numerical analysis is given to show the effectiveness of the main results. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Analysis of a delayed predator-prey system with impulsive diffusion between two patches
